    My Stay at JW Marriot Nairobi on 13th Feb 2025

    The hotel staff, service and ambience are very welcoming. They make one feel appreciated.

    The food offering is quite extensive with good variety.

    They can do better with the following:

    1. Keeping buffet food warm with better heat lamps at The Myna restaurant.

    2. After Sales service with regards to lost and found items has room for improvement, from how they handle items with care without causing any damage and swift communication by reaching out on the customer provided phone number then following up with an email as opposed to waiting for the customer to call once they notice missing items.

  9. JW Marriott Hotel Nairobi
    • Review 1
    • Votes 0
    • Member Level: Member
    • Traveler Type: Group
    5 out of 5 stars.
    10 days ago  

    An Oasis of Tranquility and Exceptional Hospitality in the Heart of Nairobi

    I recently had the pleasure of staying at the JW Marriott Hotel in Nairobi while attending a conference, and I must say, the experience was exceptional.

    Firstly, the tranquility of this hotel is truly unmatched. Nestled in the bustling heart of Nairobi, it offers a serene and peaceful atmosphere that feels like an oasis amidst the city's vibrant energy. The design and ambiance create a perfect blend of luxury and calm, making it an ideal place to unwind after a busy day.

    What truly sets this hotel apart, however, is its staff. From the moment I arrived, I was treated with the utmost respect and kindness. The team is incredibly attentive, professional, and genuinely warm, ensuring that every guest feels valued and cared for. Their hospitality left a lasting impression on me, and its one of the main reasons I am already looking forward to returning.

    Overall, my stay at JW Marriott Nairobi was nothing short of amazing. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, this hotel offers an unparalleled experience of comfort, tranquility, and outstanding service. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Nairobi!

Your Privacy

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
More information

Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

Strictly Necessary Cookies enable the basic features of our websites and mobile apps, such as booking a stay and signing in securely.

Functional Cookies

Active

Functional Cookies allow our websites and mobile apps to remember your preferences and choices you make on them. As a result, we're able to personalize your experience. For example, cookies help you navigate the site more easily by remembering your language preference.

Advertising Cookies

Inactive

Advertising Cookies allow us to track responses to online advertisements and marketing so we can better understand your interests and show content that reflects them. These cookies may also give you the option to share certain pages with social networks.

Analytics

Active

Analytics Cookies help us improve our websites and mobile apps by collecting and reporting information on how you use them without directly identifying you.
